      writes the menu in console, scans input, executes code depending on option chosen and calls menu again at the end

      • menu

        public void menu()
          throws java.io.IOException
        writes the menu in console, scans input, executes code depending on option chosen and calls menu again at the end
        Throws:
        java.io.IOException

      • queryroom

        public int queryroom()
        queries for the storage room and returns the number that the user typed in
        Returns:
        returns either "1" or "2", representing storage room 1 or 2

      • querydrink

        public int querydrink()
        queries for the drink and returns the number of it
        Returns:
        returns drink number (ranges from 0 to 5)

      • queryamount

        public int queryamount()
        queries for the amount, accepts any kind of input, as long as it is an integer
        Returns:
        the amount that the user has chosen

      • getOrderList

        public void getOrderList(int output)
                  throws java.io.IOException
        outputs the orderlist. Either on the console or as a .txt-file the orderlist is the added difference(max-amount) for all products in all rooms where max>amount
        Parameters:
        output - determines wether the output is on the console or as a .txt-file
        Throws:
        java.io.IOException - IOException appears during the creation of file. Throw needed, so that creation works

      • getInventoryList

        public void getInventoryList()
        outputs the amount for every drink separated for every room on the console
